name: Bioplague
description:
Primer Studios presents Bioplague, a short 2D platform-shooter game driven by the story of two sisters in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a mysterious disease.

This is our first game and some things have yet to be polished, so expect minor bugs and some other negligible issues.

Our Team:

Rafael Rossi García - Main Developer, Character and Enemy concept artist, Story writer

Elena Blanco Fernández - Pixel Art designer, Animator, Character and Concept Artist

Javier Reina Quirós - Pixel artist and Story writer

Jorge Ricardo Sansuste Ortuño - Pixel Art designer, Animator, Concept and Environment Artist, Character Artist

Daniel Fernández Toledo - Level designer, Pixel artist, Story writer

Juan Guerrero Palacios - Sound Design
